alert.note: Alert for Northern Bristol; Southern Worcester; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 18 at 8:22PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Norfolk, southeastern Worcester, west central Plymouth, northwestern Bristol and northeastern Providence Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 821 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Uxbridge, or 7 miles southwest of Milford, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Brockton, Pawtucket, Taunton, Woonsocket, Cumberland, Franklin, North Attleborough, Milford, Bridgewater, Attleboro, Walpole, Mansfield, Easton, Smithfield, Lincoln, Central Falls, Norton, Grafton, Sharon and Foxborough. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Northern Bristol; Southern Worcester; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth
